mapper.insert:
insert into dispatch_plan (id, plan_uuid, user_id, batch_id, phone, attach, params, status_plan, status_sync, recall, recall_params, robot, line, `result`, call_agent, clean, call_data, call_hour, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.planUuid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.batchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.attach,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.statusPlan,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.statusSync,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.recall,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.recallParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.robot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.line,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.callAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clean,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.callData,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.callHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update dispatch_plan set plan_uuid = #{planUuid,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, batch_id = #{batchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attach = #{attach,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_plan = #{statusPlan,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status_sync = #{statusSync,jdbcType=TINYINT}, recall = #{recall,jdbcType=TINYINT}, recall_params = #{recallParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, robot = #{robot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, line = #{line,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `result` = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, call_agent = #{callAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clean = #{clean,jdbcType=TINYINT}, call_data = #{callData,jdbcType=INTEGER}, call_hour = #{callHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, plan_uuid, user_id, batch_id, phone, attach, params, status_plan, status_sync, recall, recall_params, robot, line, `result`, call_agent, clean, call_data, call_hour, gmt_create, gmt_modified from dispatch_plan where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
